title: LVMNode
description: LVMNode is the Schema for the lvmnodes API

apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object. Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and may reject unrecognized values. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents. Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to. Cannot be updated. In CamelCase. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

items.description: VolumeGroup specifies attributes of a given vg exists on node.

allocationPolicy.description: AllocationPolicy indicates the volume group allocation policy. AllocationPolicy has the following mapping between int and string for its value: [-1: "", 0: "normal", 1: "contiguous", 2: "cling", 3: "anywhere", 4: "inherited"]

free.description: Free specifies the available capacity of volume group.

lvCount.description: LVCount denotes total number of logical volumes in volume group.

maxLv.description: MaxLV denotes maximum number of logical volumes allowed in volume group or 0 if unlimited.

maxPv.description: MaxPV denotes maximum number of physical volumes allowed in volume group or 0 if unlimited.

metadataCount.description: MetadataCount denotes number of metadata areas on the volume group.

metadataFree.description: MetadataFree specifies the available metadata area space for the volume group

metadataSize.description: MetadataSize specifies size of smallest metadata area for the volume group

metadataUsedCount.description: MetadataUsedCount denotes number of used metadata areas in volume group

missingPvCount.description: MissingPVCount denotes number of physical volumes in volume group which are missing.

name.description: Name of the lvm volume group.

permissions.description: Permission indicates the volume group permission which can be writable or read-only. Permission has the following mapping between int and string for its value: [-1: "", 0: "writeable", 1: "read-only"]

pvCount.description: PVCount denotes total number of physical volumes constituting the volume group.

size.description: Size specifies the total size of volume group.

snapCount.description: SnapCount denotes number of snapshots in volume group.

uuid.description: UUID denotes a unique identity of a lvm volume group.
